v0.4.1, 2013-11-14 -- loggertodb compatible with Django 1.5.5 and later.

v0.4.0, 2013-10-31 -- Improve DST handling; use pytz.

v0.3.0, 2013-10-14 -- Strip double quotes in loggertodb's simple data
                      file format.

v0.2.1, 2013-08-19 -- Improvements in installation procedure.

v0.1.0, 2013-08-14 -- Initial release.
